api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: The Faros API key to use to access the API.

graphql_api.title: GraphQL API
graphql_api.description: The version of GraphQL API for reads.

models_filter.title: Models filter
models_filter.description: Only query the following models and skip everything else.

page_size.title: Page Size
page_size.description: Page size to use when paginating through query results.

result_model.title: Result model
result_model.description: Where to place each of the query results in their corresponding output records. E.g Nested - { vcs { pullRequests { nodes: [<record>] } } }, Flat - { vcs_PullRequest: <record> }

bucket_id.title: Bucket Number
bucket_id.description: Bucket number for this source to determine which portion of models to pull. Use it when distributing the load between multiple sources. Cannot be used in combination with 'GraphQL query'. Please note that V1 graphs do not support opening multiple revisions at once, so only use buckets if writing to a V2 graph on the destination, or not writing at all.

bucket_total.title: Total Number of Buckets
bucket_total.description: Total number of buckets to distribute models across. Use it when distributing the load between multiple sources. Cannot be used in combination with 'GraphQL query'. Please note that V1 graphs do not support opening multiple revisions at once, so only use buckets if writing to a V2 graph on the destination, or not writing at all.
